title: Changing File While Video Is Playing Throws an Error on Console
body:
To Replicate:

1. Open a Video in File Explorer
2. Play Video
3. While video is playing change to another video.


You should see something like this:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6606958/136271463-62cc9aa3-1318-45dc-a185-7be3b064ebe2.png)

Console Logs:
```
app.a9ff07e676c1286e3a4c.js:65 TypeError: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'length')
    at o.set_instance_index_numbers (app.a9ff07e676c1286e3a4c.js:77)
    at o.instance_list (app.a9ff07e676c1286e3a4c.js:77)
    at _n.run (app.a9ff07e676c1286e3a4c.js:65)
    at dn (app.a9ff07e676c1286e3a4c.js:65)
    at Array.<anonymous> (app.a9ff07e676c1286e3a4c.js:65)
    at Xe (app.a9ff07e676c1286e3a4c.js:65)
    at A (<anonymous>:53:494)
qe @ app.a9ff07e676c1286e3a4c.js:65
app.a9ff07e676c1286e3a4c.js:65 TypeError: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'map')
    at o.filtered_instance_set (app.a9ff07e676c1286e3a4c.js:77)
    at _n.get (app.a9ff07e676c1286e3a4c.js:65)
    at _n.evaluate (app.a9ff07e676c1286e3a4c.js:65)
    at o.filtered_instance_set (app.a9ff07e676c1286e3a4c.js:65)
    at o.instance_list_count (app.a9ff07e676c1286e3a4c.js:77)
    at _n.get (app.a9ff07e676c1286e3a4c.js:65)
    at _n.evaluate (app.a9ff07e676c1286e3a4c.js:65)
    at o.instance_list_count (app.a9ff07e676c1286e3a4c.js:65)
    at o.<anonymous> (app.a9ff07e676c1286e3a4c.js:77)
    at o.e._render (app.a9ff07e676c1286e3a4c.js:65)
qe @ app.a9ff07e676c1286e3a4c.js:65
app.a9ff07e676c1286e3a4c.js:19 Uncaught (in promise) TypeError: this.instance_list is not iterable
    at o.add_override_colors_for_model_runs (app.a9ff07e676c1286e3a4c.js:19)
    at o.get_instances (app.a9ff07e676c1286e3a4c.js:19)
app.a9ff07e676c1286e3a4c.js:1 Uncaught (in promise) Error: AbortError: The play() request was interrupted by a new load request. https://goo.gl/LdLk22
    at app.a9ff07e676c1286e3a4c.js:1
    at A (<anonymous>:53:494)`
```
